title: Please help with my random ping spikes
body:
Hello League Boards,

I was wonder ever since I got the new Windows 10 update 9/27/16 there have been tons of ping spikes in my games and it is no fun to play with. I was wondering if anyone else is having this problem with their ping after the update for windows 10?

Thank you,
Emergency Player

replies.body: Some settings may have changed around with the update or an issue with your network that's causing your connection to become unstable and lag.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to verify the network issue, which I'm assuming will indicate some packet loss.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection and making sure everything is in order!   Let me know if you have any questions!

I'm operating on Windows 7 and have had some horrific lag spikes as of about 10pm this evening. While playing in a ranked, my friend was getting an unable to connect error upon starting which later resolved itself about 2 minutes into game. My spikes seemed to occur every 6-7 minutes or so as it happened about 6 times in the 30 minute game and my character would freeze as the ping spiked to 3k or so for about 5 seconds. Just finished running an extended ping. Results were as follows for pinging the NA server IP a rioter posted on Reddit about an hour or so after the affected game ended:

Ping statistics for 104.160.131.3:
     Packets: Sent = 716, Received - 715, Lost = 1 (0% loss).
Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds:
     Minimum = 54ms, Maximum = 3711ms, Average = 75ms

edit: I believe I got 2, maybe 3 spikes during the ping.
